history.proof: intros a1 a2 H. unfold projf. unfold quotient_projection. srun best use: quotient_projection_collapses_R unfold: projf, quotient_projection.

exceptions.exn: In environment A, B : Type R : relation A S : relation B f : A -> B equivR : equivalence R equivS : equivalence S well_defined2 : forall a1 a2 : A, R a1 a2 -> S (f a1) (f a2) a1, a2 : A H : R a1 a2 Unable to unify "exist (In (equiv_classes S)) (equiv_class S (f a2)) (equiv_class_in_quotient S (f a2))" with "exist (In (equiv_classes S)) (equiv_class S (f a1)) (equiv_class_in_quotient S (f a1))".

original: intros a1 a2 H. unfold projf. unfold quotient_projection. reflexivity.
